trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around March 23rd 2013
Summary: 4 lights traveling in a straight line
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside looking up and noticed 4 lights, 3 in a straight line and one travelling beside the 3, moving at an fast rate, when the one single light switched sides and continues flying south until fading out.
